comment.author: Alison
comment.text: Hillary... GO STRAIGHT TO JAIL! do NOT pass Go do NOT collect $200million you MUST Miss a turn! hopefully by the time You come out you can never be able to play again. Thank God Obama Dog Hussaini and Michelle Snake Hussaini have finished their turn. Now its time for Trump to take control and Win for this great Nation we cant afford to lose to scum like these criminal politicians

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: Absolutely - let's put a racist child rapist superstar billionaire into the White House because of course he is so in touch with average Americans and their plight and speaks so eloquently on the rights of others and the details of his proposed solutions. How can we righteous Americans not elect a would-be dictator into the highest office in our land? That'll sure fix what's wrong with America - when we get bombed back to the stone age for starting wars when our leader declares war on any country that looks at him sideways.
